title: Rexnord (RXN) Shares Cross Above 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Rexnord Corp (Symbol: RXN) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $26.92, changing hands as high as $26.98 per share. Rexnord Corp shares are currently trading up about 2.6% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of RXN shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
